title: Shadow Ministry of Luke Foley
text:
The Shadow Ministry of <a href="Luke%20Foley">Luke Foley</a> was the <a href="Australian%20Labor%20Party%20%28New%20South%20Wales%20Branch%29">Labor</a> opposition from December 2014 to November 2018, opposing the <a href="Mike%20Baird">Baird</a> and <a href="First%20Berejiklian%20ministry">Berejiklian</a> <a href="Coalition%20%28Australia%29">coalition</a> governments in the <a href="Parliament%20of%20New%20South%20Wales">Parliament of New South Wales</a>. The shadow ministry comprised 'spokespeople' or 'shadow <a href="Ministers%20of%20the%20Crown">ministers</a>' who aim to hold the government of the day to account.
Second arrangement (2016–2018).
The shadow ministry was made up of 22 members of the <a href="Australian%20Labor%20Party%20%28New%20South%20Wales%20Branch%29">NSW Labor</a> caucus. This arrangement commenced in March 2016.
First arrangement (2014–2016).
The shadow ministry was made up of 22 members of the <a href="Australian%20Labor%20Party%20%28New%20South%20Wales%20Branch%29">NSW Labor</a> caucus.
